alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Salt Lake...southeastern Davis...southwestern Morgan and west central Summit Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 145 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salt Lake City International Airport, or near Salt Lake City, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Bountiful, South Salt Lake, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, Summit Park, West Bountiful, Wanship, Salt Lake City International Airport, Magna, East Canyon State Park, Emigration Canyon, North Snyderville Basin, Canyon Rim, Millcreek, East Millcreek, Mount Olympus and Mill Creek Canyon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 303 and 319. Interstate 84 between mile markers 116 and 119. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 107 and 143, between mile markers 148 and 156, and between mile markers 166 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
